item.title: [Rental] Yamaha Stage Custom Birch Drum Set
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: High-quality drum set with birch shells for superior tone and projection.
item.content:encoded:
The Yamaha Stage Custom Birch drum set is a versatile and reliable instrument suitable for players of all levels. Featuring 100% birch shells, this drum set delivers a rich, focused sound with enhanced projection and sustain. With its durable hardware, professional finish options, and customizable configuration, the Stage Custom Birch is ideal for stage performance, studio recording, and practice sessions.

  • Stage Custom Series
  • High gloss lacquered 6-ply birch wood shells
  • Colour: Raven Black
  • Chrome hardware
  • Y.E.S.S. tom mount system
  • Absolute lugs
  • Steel hoops
  • Redesigned bass drum feet

Shell set comprises:

  • 22″ x 17″ Bass drum with TH945B double tom holder
  • 10″ x 07″ Tom tom
  • 12″ x 08″ Tom tom
  • 16″ x 15″ Floor tom
  • 14″ x 5.5″ Snare drum

item.title: Pearl Decade Maple Drum Set
item.dc:creator: Marius Kieldsen
item.description: Superior craftsmanship. Dynamic sound. The Pearl Decade Maple drum set features high-quality construction and versatile tone, making it a favorite among drummers seeking professional performance at an affordable price.
item.content:encoded:
Introducing the Pearl Decade Maple Drum Set – your ultimate rhythm companion! Crafted with precision and passion, this drum set offers a perfect blend of quality, versatility, and affordability. Whether you’re a seasoned pro or just starting your musical journey, the Decade Maple series delivers rich, resonant tones that will elevate your playing experience to new heights. With its sleek design and durable construction, this drum set is ready to rock any stage or studio. Get ready to unleash your creativity and groove like never before with the Pearl Decade Maple Drum Set!

  • Decade Maple Series
  • Standard version
  • DMP925S/C-227
  • Matte lacquer finish shells
  • Chrome shell hardware
  • Shells made of thin 6-ply maple with 5.4 mm wall thickness
  • 1.6 mm triple-flanged hoops
  • OptiLoc tom mounting system
  • Remo Ambassador UT and Remo Powerstroke 3 (kick drum) heads
  • Kick drum resonant head with sound hole
  • Highly responsive set with great tonal and dynamic range
  • Colour: Satin Black Slate (-227)
  • Kick drum damping cushion included

Shell configuration consisting of:

  • 22″ x 18″ Kick drum with rosette
  • 10″ x 07″ Tom tom
  • 12″ x 08″ Tom tom
  • 16″ x 16″ Floor tom
  • 14″ x 5.5″ Snare drum
  • 2x TH-900 Tom holder

Includes HWP-830 hardware pack consisting of:

  • 1x BC-830 Cymbal boom stand
  • 1x C-830 Straight cymbal stand
  • 1x H-830 Hi-Hat stand
  • 1x S-830 Snare stand
  • 1x P-930 Single drum pedal

item.title: Mapex Mars Series Drum Set
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: Bold sound. Modern style. The Mapex Mars Series drum set offers exceptional quality and versatility, featuring innovative design elements for enhanced performance and aesthetics.
item.content:encoded:
Elevate your drumming to new heights with the Mapex Mars Series Drum Set. Designed for aspiring drummers and seasoned players alike, this versatile kit offers exceptional sound, durability, and value. The Mars Series features 6-ply birch shells with SONIClear bearing edges, delivering enhanced resonance, projection, and tuning stability. The included SONIClear tom suspension system ensures maximum resonance and sustain, while the precision-engineered hardware provides reliable performance and easy setup. With its stylish design, responsive playability, and professional sound quality, the Mapex Mars Series Drum Set is the perfect choice for drummers looking to take their skills to the next level.

  • Comet Fusion Series
  • Shell material: 9-ply poplar wood shell 7.2 mm
  • Mapex 14″ hi-hat and 16″ crash made of brass
  • Chrome hardware
  • Colour: Dark Black

Shell set consisting of:

  • 20″ x 16″ (with rosette) kick drum
  • 10″ x 7″ Tom tom
  • 12″ x 8″ Tom tom
  • 14″ x 12″ Floor tom
  • 14″ x 5″ Snare drum

Hardware set consisting of:

  • 2 Single tom holders TH6215
  • C250 cymbal stand
  • H250 Hi-Hat pedal
  • P250 foot pedal
  • S250 snare stand
  • T400S throne

item.title: Pearl Export Series Drum Set
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: Reliable performance. Versatile sound. The Pearl Export Series drum set is a trusted choice for drummers of all levels, delivering consistent quality and dynamic range.
item.content:encoded:
Step into the world of professional drumming with the Pearl Export Series Drum Set. Renowned for its reliability, versatility, and exceptional sound quality, the Export Series has been a favorite among drummers for decades. This 5-piece drum kit features 6-ply poplar shells with Pearl’s Superior Shell Technology (SST), delivering a warm, balanced tone with plenty of projection and sustain. The included 830 Series hardware provides sturdy support and precise positioning for each drum and cymbal, ensuring stability and ease of setup. With its classic look, durable construction, and outstanding performance, the Pearl Export Series Drum Set is the perfect choice for players of all skill levels.

  • Fusion 2 Version
  • EXX725SBR/C
  • Drum shells with wrap finish in colour Jet Black #700
  • Chrome drum shell hardware
  • Mixed shells made of Asian mahogany and poplar for deeper, more voluminous sound

Drum shell configuration “Fusion2” comprising:

  • 22″ x 18″ Bass Drum
  • 10″ x 07″ Tom Tom
  • 12″ x 08″ Tom Tom
  • 16″ x 16″ Floor Tom
  • 14″ x 5.5″ Snare Drum

HWP830 hardware set comprising:

  • 1x BC-830 Cymbal boom stand
  • 1x C-830 Straight cymbal stand
  • S-830 Snare drum stand
  • H-830 Hi-Hat stand
  • P-930 Demonator bass drum pedal
  • 2x TH-70I Tom rack
  • Remo UT drum heads

Sabian SBR Brass cymbal set:

  • 20″ Ride
  • 16″ Crash
  • 14″ Hi-Hat
